step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder blades are moving well, but try to bring them down a bit more as you roll them back. Keep your elbows relaxed.
Great job squeezing your shoulder blades back and down! Focus on making the motion smooth and circular, and remember to breathe deeply as you pull back.
You're completing the repetitions well. Ensure your wrists stay relaxed and don't lift too high as you roll your shoulders.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply as you pull back to help your ribs expand.
